originalText.text: Car service to LGA was perfect. Driver arrived 15 minutes early and was helpful with our luggage. Very careful driver and we arrived at the airport with plenty of time to spare. I always use Carmel. IMPORTANT : According to the FTC Guidelines, when compensated for writing the review, your review MUST include a disclaimer that says something to the effect of "This is my review but I am awarded $10 Car cash from Carmel for sharing it"

originalText.text:
I started using Carmel a couple of years ago when someone recommended it to me. I love how professional, prompt and friendly the drivers are. The cars are always clean, although the car smelled like smoke on my most recent ride. With the app, I love being able to book a ride, track my driver and pay in full for tips/tolls so I know exactly what the cost is. Plus, I like being able to ping my driver to confirm before getting in the car. Highly recommend!

Please note the views and opinions expressed here are my own, although I am awarded $10 Car cash from Carmel for sharing it.

originalText.text: Whenever I have visited my brother, sister-in-law, and niece in Connecticut over the past 10 years, I have used Carmel to get me back to one of the NY airports. This isn’t a close drive either - it’s about 40 minutes without traffic.  In addition, it’s usually about 3:00 am when I have had to arrange their car services to pick me up so I can get to the airport on time to catch an early flight.  Every time I’ve scheduled them, they have come early to pick me up. Not one time have I ever have to had worry that they won’t show up.  They are always polite and courteous.  I appreciate their help!  'This is my review and I am awarded $10 Car Cash from Carmel for sharing it'

originalText.text: Driver Baron T. called to say he was on his way and gave me his arrival time which was 20 mins early. Love that. He called when he arrived and was very pleasant and helpful. He helped my husband and me with our luggage at pick up and at JFK. The vehicle was clean and well maintained. No complaints. This is my review but I am receiving $10 Carmel cash for it.

originalText.text: Had a perfect experience with Carmel! Ordered a car to get to the airport online night before. Prepaid everything at great competitive rates compared app companies.  Professional driver, punctual and would definitely use again.
